filters.description: The site's default filter. Hides porn, and spoilers images containing saucy content, or artistic nudity.
filters.name: Default

filters.description: This filter won't filter out anything at all. Everything is visible, no guard rails. While using this "filter" you agree to never complain about the content you're exposed to unless it outright breaks site rules.
filters.name: Everything

filters.description: Shows everything, but spoilers all non-furry content.
filters.name: Everything (Furry Only)

filters.description: A site default filter for adult perusal of the site. Spoilers some potentially upsetting or shocking content.
filters.name: Default 18+

filters.description: A default filter that shows all images, with a spoiler for those not rated safe. Useful for performing searches on contentious tags.
filters.name: Maximum Spoilers
